common.description: 승인정보를 생성하기 위한 정기결제 내역을 승인시스템 전송한다.

io.name: TTADMKCH0010201_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TTADMKCH0010201_inbound" /> <complexType name="TTADMKCH0010201_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="crdNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="16" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="storeCd"> <annotation> <documentation>점코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="posNo"> <annotation> <documentation>포스번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="stlmAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>결제금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="decimal"> <totalDigits value="20" /> <fractionDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="frcsNo"> <annotation> <documentation>가맹점번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="16" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
